title: Whats the point of playing this game
body: So im in promos at s3 with mmr at s1 almost gold and i win my first, lose the 2nd and get to the third game our support is first pick (im adc) and he auto locks zed and forces our mid to tilt and play a support he clearly didn't know how to use as he was using bard ult to stun the enemy we were trying to tower dive (i think u all know what happened on that dive) and we lose this game obviously so i lose my promos ok 90 lp i can just win and get back into promos. i pick my roles and i can 100% say i was a protected pick for jg or adc and you know what i get, support so clearly riot just doesn't want me to win but wait it gets worse, my adc tells everyone to kill themselves and quits leaving us a 4v5 gotta love how fair this game is.

replies.body:
Yes, those that pick ADC have the most right to complain.

Sigh.
